name: Garlic Butter Shrimp with Rice
description: Classic shrimp recipe ready in 10 minutes. Delicious with garlic and lemon.

instructions.instruction: Pat shrimp dry with paper towels.
Melt 2 tbsp butter in a pan.
Cook shrimp for 2 minutes per side, remove and set aside.
Add remaining butter and garlic, saut√© for 30 seconds.
Add white wine and reduce by half.
Add lemon juice and red pepper flakes.
Return shrimp to the pan, coat with sauce.
Serve over rice with parsley garnish.

tips: Don't overcook shrimp - they become rubbery.
Chicken broth can replace white wine.
servingSuggestion: Serve with crusty bread to soak up the sauce.
variations: Lobster tail makes a more luxurious version.
Can also be served over pasta.
